description: NeonNote is a component for displaying important information to the user, such as - notes, hints or quotes.

props.name: color
props.description: The color of the note. In the case of the colors info, success, warn and error an icon will also be displayed to further enhance user comprehension.

props.name: closable
props.description: Whether or not the note has a close button

props.name: icon
props.description: Display the associated icon for info, success, warn and error colors.

events.name: close-note
events.description: emitted when the user clicks the close button on the note
